name: snakeroban
description:
please enjoy (?)

(if you don't recognize the sokoban puzzle this is riffing on, you should probably play it here first -- it's level 1)

controls
  • WASD/arrow keys: turn
  • X/Space: use menu / set speed / advance time
  • Escape: go to level select menu (there's a bonus level if you beat the first one)

gameplay tip: if speed 1 is too much, try speed 0 -- the snake will only move when you press X/Space

Made for the Confounding Calendar 2022. Thanks to tally, Daniel, q1, and Brin for playtesting!
